ValidationRule.description: Only users with the permission set for closing referrals can set them to "Closed Won".
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Profile.Name="System Administrator"), NOT($Profile.Name = "Automated Process"), NOT($Permission.Close_Referrals), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won"), ISCHANGED(StageName) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only Partnership management can set referral opportunities to "Closed Won".
